item.text: The second lot belonged to the tribe of Simeon by its clans. Their assigned land was in the middle of Judah’s assigned land.

<st data-num="01992" class="">Their</st> <st data-num="05159" class="">assigned land</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">included</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0884" class="">Beer Sheba</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="04137" class="">Moladah</st>,
<st data-num="02705" class="">Hazar Shual</st>, <st data-num="01088" class="">Balah</st>, <st data-num="06107" class="">Ezem</st>,
<st data-num="0513" class="">Eltolad</st>, <st data-num="01329" class="">Bethul</st>, <st data-num="02767" class="">Hormah</st>,
<st data-num="06860" class="">Ziklag</st>, <st data-num="01024" class="">Beth Marcaboth</st>, <st data-num="02701" class="">Hazar Susah</st>,

<st data-num="01034" class="">Beth Lebaoth</st>, and <st data-num="08287" class="">Sharuhen</st>—a total of <st data-num="07969 06240">13</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and their <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st>,

<st data-num="05871" class="">Ain</st>, <st data-num="07417" class="">Rimmon</st>, <st data-num="06281" class="">Ether</st>, and <st data-num="06228" class="">Ashan</st>—a total of <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and their <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st>,

as well as <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02691 0834">towns</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="01192" class="">Baalath Beer</st> (<st data-num="07414" class="">Ramah</st> of the <st data-num="05045" class="">Negev</st>). <st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> was the <st data-num="05159" class="">land assigned</st> to the <st data-num="04294" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="01121 08095">Simeon</st> by its <st data-num="04940" class="">clans</st>.<n id="1" />
Simeon’s assigned land was taken from Judah’s allotted portion, for Judah’s territory was too large for them; so Simeon was assigned land within Judah.
The third lot belonged to the tribe of Zebulun by its clans. The border of their territory extended to Sarid.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">westward</st> to <st data-num="04831" class="">Maralah</st> and <st data-num="06293" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="01708" class="">Dabbesheth</st> <st data-num="06293 0413">and</st> the <st data-num="05158 0834">valley</st> <st data-num="05921 06440">near</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03362" class="">Jokneam</st>.

From <st data-num="08301" class="">Sarid</st> it <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="06924 04217 08121">eastward</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> of <st data-num="03696" class="">Kisloth Tabor</st>, <st data-num="03318" class="">extended</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="01705" class="">Daberath</st>, and <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> to <st data-num="03309" class="">Japhia</st>.

From <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> it <st data-num="05674" class="">crossed</st> <st data-num="06924 04217">eastward</st> to <st data-num="01662" class="">Gath Hepher</st> and <st data-num="06278" class="">Eth Kazin</st>, and <st data-num="03318" class="">extended</st> to <st data-num="07417" class="">Rimmon</st>, <st data-num="08388" class="">turning toward</st> <st data-num="05269" class="">Neah</st>.

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> then <st data-num="05437" class="">turned</st> on the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> to <st data-num="02615" class="">Hannathon</st> and <st data-num="01961 08444">ended</st> at the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="03317" class="">Iphtah El</st>.

Their territory included <st data-num="07005" class="">Kattah</st>, <st data-num="05096" class="">Nahalal</st>, <st data-num="08110" class="">Shimron</st>, <st data-num="03030" class="">Idalah</st>, and <st data-num="01035" class="">Bethlehem</st>;<n id="1" /> in all they had <st data-num="08147 06240">12</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and their <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st>.<n id="2" />
This was the land assigned to the tribe of Zebulun by its clans, including these cities and their towns.
The fourth lot belonged to the tribe of Issachar by its clans.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">assigned land</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">included</st> <st data-num="03157" class="">Jezreel</st>, <st data-num="03694" class="">Kesulloth</st>, <st data-num="07766" class="">Shunem</st>,
<st data-num="02663" class="">Hapharaim</st>, <st data-num="07866" class="">Shion</st>, <st data-num="0588" class="">Anaharath</st>,
<st data-num="07245" class="">Rabbith</st>, <st data-num="07191" class="">Kishion</st>, <st data-num="077" class="">Ebez</st>,
<st data-num="07432" class="">Remeth</st>, <st data-num="05873" class="">En Gannim</st>, <st data-num="05876" class="">En Haddah</st> and <st data-num="01048" class="">Beth Pazzez</st>.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> <st data-num="06293" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="08396" class="">Tabor</st>, <st data-num="07831" class="">Shahazumah</st>, and <st data-num="01053" class="">Beth Shemesh</st>, and <st data-num="01961 08444 01366">ended</st> at the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>. They had <st data-num="08337 06240">16</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and their <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st>.
This was the land assigned to the tribe of Issachar by its clans, including these cities and their towns.
The fifth lot belonged to the tribe of Asher by its clans.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">included</st> <st data-num="02520" class="">Helkath</st>, <st data-num="02482" class="">Hali</st>, <st data-num="0991" class="">Beten</st>, <st data-num="0407" class="">Acshaph</st>,

<st data-num="0487" class="">Alammelech</st>, <st data-num="06008" class="">Amad</st>, and <st data-num="04861" class="">Mishal</st>. Their border <st data-num="06293" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="03760" class="">Carmel</st> to the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> and <st data-num="07884" class="">Shihor Libnath</st>.

It <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="04217 08121">eastward</st> toward <st data-num="01016" class="">Beth Dagon</st>, <st data-num="06293" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st> and the <st data-num="01516" class="">Valley</st> of <st data-num="03317" class="">Iphtah El</st> to the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>, as well as <st data-num="01025" class="">Beth Emek</st> and <st data-num="05272" class="">Neiel</st>, and <st data-num="03318" class="">extended</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03521" class="">Cabul</st> on the <st data-num="08040" class="">north</st><n id="1" />

and on to <st data-num="05683" class="">Ebron</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07340" class="">Rehob</st>, <st data-num="02540" class="">Hammon</st>, and <st data-num="07071" class="">Kanah</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="07227" class="">Greater</st> <st data-num="06721" class="">Sidon</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> then <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> toward <st data-num="07414" class="">Ramah</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> the <st data-num="04013" class="">fortified</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> of <st data-num="06865" class="">Tyre</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="07725 01366">turned</st> to <st data-num="02621" class="">Hosah</st>, and <st data-num="01961 08444">ended</st> at the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st> near <st data-num="02256" class="">Hebel</st>, <st data-num="0392" class="">Achzib</st>,

<st data-num="05981" class="">Umah</st>, <st data-num="0663" class="">Aphek</st>, and <st data-num="07340" class="">Rehob</st>. In all they had<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06242 08147" class="">22</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and their <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st>.
This was the land assigned to the tribe of Asher by its clans, including these cities and their towns.
The sixth lot belonged to the tribe of Naphtali by its clans.

Their <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">started</st> at <st data-num="02501" class="">Heleph</st> and the <st data-num="0438" class="">oak</st> of <st data-num="06815" class="">Zaanannim</st>, went to <st data-num="0129" class="">Adami</st> <st data-num="05346" class="">Nekeb</st>, <st data-num="02995" class="">Jabneel</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">and on to</st> <st data-num="03946" class="">Lakkum</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="01961 08444">ended</st> at the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="01366" class="">It</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">westward</st> to <st data-num="0243" class="">Aznoth Tabor</st>, <st data-num="03318" class="">extended</st> from <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> to <st data-num="02712" class="">Hukok</st>, <st data-num="06293" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st> on the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st>, <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st> <st data-num="06293" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>, and the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="04217 08121">east</st>.

The <st data-num="04013" class="">fortified</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> included <st data-num="06661" class="">Ziddim</st>, <st data-num="06863" class="">Zer</st>, <st data-num="02575" class="">Hammath</st>, <st data-num="07557" class="">Rakkath</st>, <st data-num="03672" class="">Kinnereth</st>,
<st data-num="0128" class="">Adamah</st>, <st data-num="07414" class="">Ramah</st>, <st data-num="02674" class="">Hazor</st>,<n id="1" />
<st data-num="06943" class="">Kedesh</st>, <st data-num="0154" class="">Edrei</st>, <st data-num="05877" class="">En Hazor</st>,

<st data-num="03375" class="">Yiron</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="04027" class="">Migdal El</st>, <st data-num="02765" class="">Horem</st>, <st data-num="01043" class="">Beth Anath</st>, and <st data-num="01053" class="">Beth Shemesh</st>. In all they had<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08672 06240">19</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and their <st data-num="02691" class="">towns</st>.
This was the land assigned to the tribe of Naphtali by its clans, including these cities and their towns.
The seventh lot belonged to the tribe of Dan by its clans.

Their <st data-num="01366 05159">assigned land</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">included</st> <st data-num="06881" class="">Zorah</st>, <st data-num="0847" class="">Eshtaol</st>, <st data-num="05905" class="">Ir Shemesh</st>,
<st data-num="08169" class="">Shaalabbin</st>, <st data-num="0357" class="">Aijalon</st>, <st data-num="03494" class="">Ithlah</st>,
<st data-num="0356" class="">Elon</st>, <st data-num="08553" class="">Timnah</st>, <st data-num="06138" class="">Ekron</st>,
<st data-num="0514" class="">Eltekeh</st>, <st data-num="01405" class="">Gibbethon</st>, <st data-num="01191" class="">Baalath</st>,
<st data-num="03055" class="">Jehud</st>, <st data-num="01139" class="">Bene Berak</st>, <st data-num="01667" class="">Gath Rimmon</st>,

the <st data-num="4325" class="">waters</st> of <st data-num="04313" class="">Jarkon</st>, and <st data-num="07542" class="">Rakkon</st>, <st data-num="05973" class="">including</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st> <st data-num="04136" class="">in front of</st> <st data-num="03305" class="">Joppa</st>.

(The <st data-num="01121 01835">Danites</st> <st data-num="03318 01992">failed to conquer</st> their <st data-num="01366" class="">territory</st>,<n id="1" /> so <st data-num="01121 01835">they</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">went up</st> and <st data-num="03898" class="">fought</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> <st data-num="03959" class="">Leshem</st> and <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> it. They <st data-num="05221" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="06310 02719">sword</st> to it, <st data-num="03423" class="">took possession of</st> it, and <st data-num="03427" class="">lived</st> in it. They <st data-num="07121" class="">renamed</st> <st data-num="03959" class="">it</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">after</st> their <st data-num="01835 01">ancestor</st>.<n id="3" />)
This was the land assigned to the tribe of Dan by its clans, including these cities and their towns.
When they finished dividing the land into its regions, the Israelites gave Joshua son of Nun some land.
As the Lord had instructed, they gave him the city he requested—Timnath Serah in the Ephraimite hill country. He built up the city and lived in it.

These are the land assignments that Eleazar the priest, Joshua son of Nun, and the Israelite tribal leaders made by drawing lots in Shiloh before the Lord at the entrance of the tent of meeting. So they finished dividing up the land.
